column11: 2015 at the eldora nursing and rehabilitation center in eldora. funeral services will be held at 10:00 a. m. on monday
column13: 2015 at the first baptist church in eldora
column14: with pastor mark chapman officiating. burial will follow in the sheller cemetery. visitation will be held one hour prior to his service at the church on monday. james alan nederhoff
column15: son of henry and lorraine cuffel nederhoff was born on august 10
column17: iowa. he received his education from the wellsburg community school and graduated from grundy center high school in 1971. following his graduation
column18: jim lived for a while in marshalltown before moving to eldora. in his younger years
column19: jim enjoyed trapping and fishing with his brother
column20: ron and his father. he was a big sports fan and especially loved the iowa hawkeyes. he also enjoyed computers and keeping in touch with his family and friends thru facebook. survivors include his sister
column21: janet nederhoff of eldora; and several nieces
column23: aunts and uncles. jim was preceded in death by his parents
